text: Hagi maka Juda mopafima me'nea ranra kumatamimofo kafantera, witi honama azotareti'ma eriherahe'ma hazageno zaho'mo eri hareno viaza hu'na, vaheni'a zamazeri panini hugahue. Ana nehu'na mofavre naga zaminena zamahe hana hugahue. Na'ankure zamagra havi avu'ava zana atre'za zamagu'a rukrahera osu'naze.
